content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia, I'm glad you found the apartment to your liking. Now, about the rental price, I was thinking of starting at €1,000 per month. Keep in mind, this is a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center, so I believe it's a fair price. Let's negotiate.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your time, Herr Schmidt. The apartment is indeed in a great location and very convenient for me. I'm looking to rent a place that is not only comfortable but also offers good value for my money. How does €950 per month sound to you? I think it's a reasonable offer, considering the size and the central location.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, €950 per month is definitely not acceptable. I am looking for a higher price, considering the prime location of the apartment. Let's negotiate further.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that you're looking for a higher price, Herr Schmidt, but I'm also on a budget. I'm willing to pay a bit more for the convenience and quality of this apartment, but I'd like to find a price that works for both of us. How about €975? I think that's a fair compromise.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, €975 per month is still not acceptable. I believe this apartment is worth more than that. Let's negotiate further.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, Herr Schmidt, I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about €990? This is my final offer, and I think it's a very fair price for both parties. I'm hoping to reach an agreement with you.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, €990 per month is still not good enough. I am looking for a higher price, considering the prime location of the apartment. Let's negotiate further.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm sorry, Herr Schmidt, but I can't go any higher than €990. This is my final offer. If you're not willing to accept this price, I'll have to look for other options.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because you are not willing to meet my price expectations.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Herr Schmidt. It was nice meeting you, and I appreciate your time. Good luck with finding a tenant who meets your expectations. TERMINATE
name: Emilia Müller from Germany
